name: Stethy Health Pty Ltd
description: Developer of an artificial intelligence-based healthcare software designed to improve compliance and reduce resourcing. The company's software uses artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms that help the doctor to get a list of the symptoms and a proposed diagnosis before the patient walks into their treatment room and allow them to think and prepare what to ask, it automates data-heavy workflows within healthcare and the life sciences, enabling doctors and nurses to diagnose and treat patients effectively.
